function: Attunes to witnessed excellence and values alignment; seeds aspiration without self-erasure.
information_provided: Observed behavior or quality resonates with your internal standards and expands possibility space.
authentic_output: Respectful acknowledgement; integration of lesson; voluntary aspiration.
corrupted_output: Idolization; self-inferiority; projection of perfection onto the other.

response_protocol.detect: Notice resonance with witnessed excellence or craft.
response_protocol.assess: Name the concrete quality (skill, integrity, perseverance). Check for self-diminishment.
response_protocol.respond: Express respect or integrate one actionable micro-practice.
response_protocol.release: Let go of comparison; keep the principle, not the pedestal.
